dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Map of modern Athens surrounded by pictorial view of ancient ruins; published to commemorate the capture of Athens from the Turks by the Venetians in 1687. Includes key to pictorial view with title: Tauola delle cose più osseruate in questo disegno iconograico d'Atene, preso da Veneti, in 8 giorni d'assedio, li 28 settembre del 1687.
